scripts.build: wp-scripts build --webpack-src-dir=src/blocks --output-path=build && cp src/blocks/listings-card/render.php build/listings-card/render.php && cp src/blocks/listing-details/render.php build/listing-details/render.php && cp src/blocks/related-listings/render.php build/related-listings/render.php && cp src/blocks/listing-search/render.php build/listing-search/render.php && cp src/blocks/listing-search/view.js build/listing-search/view.js && cp src/blocks/categories-slider/render.php build/categories-slider/render.php && cp src/blocks/categories-slider/view.js build/categories-slider/view.js && cp src/blocks/listings-archive/render.php build/listings-archive/render.php && cp src/blocks/listings-archive/view.js build/listings-archive/view.js
